desc: A type defining an execution graph flow (control or data)

definition.label: from
definition.desc: Path of the port from which this link starts (a path is composed with a block id, a port name and optianaly a set of hierarchical sub-properties, all alphanumeric and camelCase strings separated by dots)

definition.label: to
definition.desc: Path of the port to which this link ends (a path is composed with a block id, a port name and optianaly a set of hierarchical sub-properties, all alphanumeric and camelCase strings separated by dots)
